Snakes Eyes was developed for the GMTK2022 with the theme "Roll of the 

the term "Snake Eyes" refers to when you roll two ones on two standard 6 sided dice.

you can play by yourself or with a friend controlling two dice. your objective is to get them to the goal while having both dice rolling snake eyes.
